user.title: Add Fish.audio Text-to-Speech Engine
user.description: Provide configuration data for Fish.audio TTS. See documentation for details.

data.api_key: Enter your Fish.audio API key (optional if public access is enabled).
data.voice_id: Enter the Voice ID (from Fish.audio voice selection).
data.url: Enter the Fish.audio WebSocket endpoint (default: wss://api.fish.audio/v1/tts/live).

error.wrong_api_key: Invalid API key. Please enter a valid Fish.audio API key.
error.already_configured: This voice and endpoint are already configured.
error.invalid_voice_id: Invalid Voice ID. Ensure you are using a valid voice reference.

abort.already_configured: This voice and endpoint are already configured.
